update sys_application set
NAME = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPDESC = #{desc, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
URL = #{url, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT = #{sort, jdbcType=INTEGER},
SHOWMENU = #{showMenu, jdbcType=INTEGER},
NODEID = #{nodeId, jdbcType=BIGINT},
where ID = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select E.* from sys_application E inner join sys_access A on E.ID = A.APPID where A.ROLEID = #{roleId}

select E.* from sys_application E inner join sys_access A on E.id = A.appId where A.roleId in ( select dr.id from sys_dept_role dr inner join sys_user_role ur on dr.id = ur.roleid where ur.userid = #{userId} and ur.authorized = 0 )

select E.url, r.code from sys_application E inner join sys_access A on E.id = A.appId inner join sys_dept_role dr on A.roleid = dr.id inner join sys_role r on dr.sysroleid = r.id where E.url is not null and E.url != '' order by E.url asc
